Title.Language: Psalm Trailer for the Pope or a Bishop

Comment.Language: The Trailer Psalm is chanted in the presence of the Pope or a bishop, after the psalm:

Text.Language: Marou[acf qen t~ekk~l/cia n~te peflaoc:
Let them exalt Him in the church of His people,
